# Audit.ISchemaProvider interface

An interface to allow the specification of schemas to be loaded when reading the IDS xml file.

```csharp
public interface ISchemaProvider
```

## Members

| name | description |
| --- | --- |
| [GetSchemas](Audit.ISchemaProvider/GetSchemas.md)(…) | This method should return the collection of schemas to be loaded. |
